What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Business&Finance > Careers&Employment > Food Service > Resolved Question ken l Member since: 20 May 2007 Total points: 89 (Level 1) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » Which fast food restaurant in Australia gives the highest pay?Should I work in mcdonalds or hungry jacks?
5 years ago Report Abuse by Leila Member since: 25 January 2007 Total points: 609 (Level 2) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters I can tell you who gives the lowest pay. which is KFC its really depends on your age. my friend who works at maccas gets payed 3 bucks an hour coz she dosnt have her tax file number but when she does she gets payed 8 dollars. Plus a 50% discount of food. But no free food, Some people get 10 and hour but it really depends on how old you are. Hungry Jacks has better food (well thats in my opinion) and would probably get paid at the same rate I'd say if you work in the food court go to one of those independent shops which are really busy. usually they pay the most. Or maybe even a cafe thats not gloria jeans or starbucks 5 years ago Report Abuse
